column3: Debra Coupar (Lab){{efn|Coupar lost her seat at the [[Leeds City Council election, 2004|next election in 2004.]] She was elected to council again in [[Leeds City Council election, 2006|2006]] for [[Middleton Park (ward)|Middleton Park]] ward, stepping down in [[Leeds City Council election, 2010|2010]]. Coupar went on to be elected as a [[Cross Gates and Whinmoor (ward)|Cross Gates and Whinmoor]] ward councillor in the [[Leeds City Council election, 2012#By-elections between 2012 and 2014|2013 by-election]] and has represented [[Temple Newsam]] ward since [[Leeds City Council election, 2016|2016]].}}
Judith Elliott (MBI){{efn|'MBI' is an acronym for the Morley Borough Independents.}}
Judith Elliott MBE (MBI){{efn|Elliott was awarded an [[MBE]] in the [[2012 Birthday Honours]].}}
